text:
@JackPosobiec @AOC Condoning violence the burning of businesses Looting.
 She didn't condone everyone getting a chance to have a job start a business when unemployment was rock bottom just 3 months ago 

Now she uses Coronavirus/ racism to further her AGENDA 
ARREST HER FOR INSTIGATING RIOTS
